title: Bug 44282WebappClassLoader.findClass calls getClassLoader without privileges
OB: When logging is in TRACE mode or lower,org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader.findClass(String) callsgetClassLoader() without a privileged block.With security enabled, this willcause a SecurityException if the RuntimePermission to getClassLoader is not granted.
SR: When logging is in TRACE mode or lower,org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoader.findClass(String) callsgetClassLoader() without a privileged block.With security enabled, this willcause a SecurityException if the RuntimePermission to getClassLoader is not granted.
